name: MaxLWell and Newbob
description:
This game is about showing a friend an awesome game and helping them getting started. It is a local co-op game (but can also be played as singleplayer if you are hardcore).

== Objective ==

Player 1, the experience played with a max-level character, has convinced Player 2 to try out this favorite game. But Player 2's character needs to level up, so they go to a dungeon to grind some XP for Player 2. Player 1 must protect Player 2 at all cost, while Player 2 needs to collect XP orbs.

== Controls ==

Player 1:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Attacking: Q

Player 2:

  • Movement: Arrow keys

It is also possible to use joysticks

== Credits ==

This game was made by Nicolaj 'Eastvillage' Jensen for Extra Credits Game Jam 2020.
